tier1_factual.text: What is the revenue in Q3? Answer in exact dollars.
Which quarter had the highest revenue?

tier2_pattern.text: Describe the overall revenue trend.
What is the approximate growth rate from Q1 to Q4? Answer in percent.
Which quarter had the highest growth rate compared to its previous quarter?

tier1_factual.text: What is the KPI score for March? Answer in exact score.
Which month had the highest KPI score?

tier2_pattern.text: What is the average KPI score across all months? Answer in exact score.
Which month had the lowest performance?
Between April and June, which month shows the steepest decline compared to its previous month?

tier1_factual.text: How many visitors entered the funnel? Answer in exact count.
How many customers were converted? Answer in exact count.

tier2_pattern.text: What is the overall conversion rate from visitors to customers? Answer in percent.
Which stage has the highest drop-off?
What percent of visitors become trials? Answer in percent.

tier1_factual.text: What is the sales amount for the East region? Answer in exact dollars.
Which region has the highest sales?

tier2_pattern.text: What is the total sales across all regions? Answer in exact dollars.
Which region has the lowest sales?
Which region shows the largest drop relative to the best-performing region?

tier1_factual.text: How many users were there in June? Answer in exact count.
What was the user count at the end of the year? Answer in exact count.

tier2_pattern.text: What is the overall growth rate from January to December? Answer in percent.
Describe the user growth trend.
Which month had the highest absolute month-over-month growth (most new users)?

tier1_factual.text: What is the conversion rate for the control group? Answer in percent.
Which variant has the highest conversion rate?

tier2_pattern.text: What is the improvement of the best variant over control? Answer in percentage points.
What is the conversion rate for Variant B? Answer in percent.
What is Variant B's lift over Control in percent? Answer in percent.

tier1_factual.text: What is the minimum latency recorded? Answer in milliseconds.
What is the latency at hour 12? Answer in milliseconds.

tier2_pattern.text: What is the average latency across all hours? Answer in milliseconds.
At what hour does latency peak?
Which hour has the steepest latency increase compared to the previous hour?

tier1_factual.text: What was the starting price? Answer in exact dollars.
What was the ending price? Answer in exact dollars.

tier2_pattern.text: What was the total price change? Answer in exact dollars.
What was the percentage change? Answer in percent.
Which day saw the largest single-day gain?

tier1_factual.text: What percentage of budget goes to Marketing? Answer in percent.
Which department gets the largest budget allocation?

tier2_pattern.text: What percentage goes to Development? Answer in percent.
Which department has the smallest budget allocation?
What percent of total budget is Marketing plus Development? Answer in percent.

tier1_factual.text: What was the revenue in March? Answer in exact dollars.
How many customers were there in June? Answer in exact count.

tier2_pattern.text: What is the revenue growth rate from January to June? Answer in percent.
What is the revenue per customer in June? Answer in exact dollars.
When Revenue peaks, approximately how many Customers are there? Answer in exact count.

tier1_factual.text: What is the approximate correlation coefficient between spend and revenue? Answer in decimal.
Which campaign generated the highest revenue?

tier2_pattern.text: Describe the relationship between marketing spend and revenue.
If marketing spend reaches $110,000, what revenue should be expected? Answer in exact dollars.
Is the relationship effectively positive or negative?

tier1_factual.text: Which region-month combination achieved the highest quality score?
What was the lowest quality score recorded? Answer in exact score.

tier2_pattern.text: Which region shows the most consistent quality across months?
What is the overall average quality score across the grid? Answer in exact score.
Which region has the most consistent intensity across months?

tier1_factual.text: Which service has the highest median latency?
What is the median latency for the Checkout service? Answer in milliseconds.

tier2_pattern.text: Which service experiences the widest latency variability?
Approximately how many outliers does the Analytics service have? Answer in exact count.
Which service has the largest IQR?

tier1_factual.text: Which component caused the largest decrease in cash?
What is the ending cash balance? Answer in thousands.

tier2_pattern.text: What is the net change from starting to ending cash? Answer in thousands.
Did positive drivers outweigh the negative impacts?
What percent of net change is explained by Revenue? Answer in percent.

tier1_factual.text: Approximately how many active users were there in 2020? Answer in exact count.
What is the user count in 2025? Answer in exact count.

tier2_pattern.text: What is the average annual growth factor across the observed period? Answer in decimal.
Roughly how many years does it take for the user base to double? Answer in years.
Which year has the highest multiplicative growth over its previous year?

tier1_factual.text: Which phase begins last in the schedule?
What is the total number of days from kickoff to launch? Answer in days.

tier2_pattern.text: Which two phases overlap the most in time?
What is the cumulative critical-path duration? Answer in days.
Which two phases overlap the longest?

tier1_factual.text: Which company holds the largest market share?
Which company has the highest profit margin?

tier2_pattern.text: Which firm achieves the highest profit margin per thousand employees?
Into which quadrant does Dynamo fall based on margin and volume?
Which company has the best margin per thousand employees?

tier1_factual.text: In which category does Product Beta outperform Product Alpha the most?
What is the average score of Product Alpha across all categories? Answer in exact score.

tier2_pattern.text: Which product shows a more balanced performance overall?
What is the score difference in the Support category (Beta minus Alpha)? Answer in exact score.
Which category shows the greatest advantage for Product Beta over Alpha?

tier1_factual.text: What is the total revenue across all segments in 2023? Answer in millions.
Which segment contributes the most revenue in 2023?

tier2_pattern.text: Describe the overall trend in total revenue from 2020 to 2023.
By how much did total revenue grow from 2020 to 2023? Answer in millions.
What percent of total in 2022 came from Enterprise? Answer in percent.

tier1_factual.text: What was the churn rate in June? Answer in percent.
What was the customer satisfaction score in August? Answer in exact score.

tier2_pattern.text: What is the approximate correlation between churn and satisfaction? Answer in decimal.
By what percentage did churn improve from January to August? Answer in percent.
At the month of minimum churn, what is satisfaction? Answer in exact score.

tier1_factual.text: What were the actual sales in August? Answer in thousands.
What is the forecasted sales for December? Answer in thousands.

tier2_pattern.text: Which month shows the largest variance between actual and forecast?
Describe the overall relationship between actuals and forecast.
Which month deviates most from forecast (absolute difference)?

tier1_factual.text: Which product delivers the highest gross margin?
Approximately how many units did the top volume product sell? Answer in exact units.

tier2_pattern.text: How many products fall into the Strategic quadrant? Answer in exact count.
Describe the trade-off trend between margin and volume.
How many products fall in Strategic quadrant? Answer in exact count.

tier1_factual.text: Which cohort maintains the highest retention by Month 6?
What is the retention rate for that cohort in Month 6? Answer in decimal (0-1).

tier2_pattern.text: Describe the general retention trend across cohorts.
How many cohorts retain above 60% by Month 4? Answer in exact count.
Excluding Month 1, which cohort retains best by Month 6?

tier1_factual.text: Which channel has the highest median response time?
What is the median response time for Chat? Answer in minutes.

tier2_pattern.text: Which channel shows the widest variability (largest IQR)?
Approximately how many outliers does the Social channel have? Answer in exact count.
Which channel has the most outliers? Answer channel name.

tier1_factual.text: What was the demand in Week 1? Answer in exact units.
What was the supply in Week 16? Answer in exact units.

tier2_pattern.text: In which week is the absolute gap between supply and demand largest?
Describe the overall relationship between supply and demand.
In which week do Supply and Demand lines cross?

tier1_factual.text: What was the observed throughput on Day 15? Answer in exact units.
Which days are flagged as anomalies?

tier2_pattern.text: How much above baseline was the largest positive anomaly? Answer in exact units.
Describe the general throughput trend excluding anomalies.
Excluding anomalies, what is the overall trend?

tier1_factual.text: How many Medium severity incidents occurred? Answer in exact count.
Which severity has the longest average resolution time?

tier2_pattern.text: What percent of total incidents were Low severity? Answer in percent.
Describe the relationship between severity and average resolution time.
What percent of all incidents are High plus Critical? Answer in percent.

tier1_factual.text: What is the Platform revenue in Q4? Answer in millions.
Which segment shows a downward trend across the year?

tier2_pattern.text: What is the total revenue in Q4? Answer in millions.
Describe the overall portfolio mix shift during the year.
What percent of total in Q4 is Services? Answer in percent.

tier1_factual.text: Which objective has progressed the furthest?
What is the total timeline horizon in days? Answer in days.

tier2_pattern.text: Which objective is the least complete?
Describe the overall progress distribution across objectives.
Which objective has the highest velocity (progress per day)?

tier1_factual.text: Which competitor has the highest overall average score?
What is Comp B's score for Innovation? Answer in exact score.

tier2_pattern.text: Which attribute shows the greatest spread across competitors?
Describe the overall positioning of Comp C.
Which attribute has the widest spread across competitors?
